justification: Acknowledges Team B’s taste for high-upside rookies, but ignores their urgent need for immediate production; offering an injured RB and a rookie with a declining role is misaligned. Says “playoff push” for a 3–5 team. Also mismatched with Team A’s conservative, floor-first profile by targeting another volatile deep threat. Value/tier logic is shaky (Tier 2 WR + injured RB for Tier 3 WR). Rationale is generic and thin; acceptance probability seems overstated.
